subject: p16662264
History: -year-old with end-stage renal disease status post transplant, presents with recent history of pneumonia.
Findings: Study is essentially unchanged from immediately prior study dated. Middle lobe and lingular infiltrate are once again observed and essentially unchanged. There has been a slight interval decrease of bilateral pleural effusions. No new areas of consolidation are appreciated. No pneumothorax. The cardiomediastinal silhouette is stable and within normal limits.
Impression: Unchanged bilateral pneumonia with decreased pleural effusions.
